title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 3.20 - Action by department employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 3.20 - Action by department employees

State Regulations

When exercising discretion as permitted in this Title, unless
otherwise specified, department employees should consider the safety or
security of persons or property; security or control of correctional
facilities; management or fiscal concerns; rehabilitation of inmates, or other
correctional goals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
3.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
